io.github.cottonmc.cotton.gui.widget

Class WPlayerInvPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.cottonmc.cotton.gui.widget.WWidget
      • io.github.cottonmc.cotton.gui.widget.WPanel
        • io.github.cottonmc.cotton.gui.widget.WPlainPanel
          • io.github.cottonmc.cotton.gui.widget.WPlayerInvPanel

  • public class WPlayerInvPanel
extends WPlainPanel
    A player inventory widget that has a visually separate hotbar.

      • validate

        public void validate(GuiDescription c)
        Description copied from class: WPanel
        Creates component peers, lays out children, and initializes animation data for this Widget and all its children. The host container must clear any heavyweight peers from its records before this method is called.

        Subclasses should call super.validate(c) to ensure that children are validated.

        Overrides:
        validate in class WPanel
        Parameters:
        c - the host GUI description
